person.persName: Antonio B. Longinotto (Louisville, Kentucky, fruit store operator, confectioner, and tavernkeeper)

body.p: Louisville, Kentucky, fruit store operator, confectioner, and tavernkeeper. Native of Italy. Married to Mary Anna Botta Longinotto. Father of Mary Longinotto, Anthony Longinotto, Joseph Longinotto, Amelia Longinotto, and William J. Longinotto. Immigrated to the United States in 1847. Fruit store operator in Louisville, Kentucky, in 1858. Tavernkeeper in Louisville in 1860. Employed John Cassella as a barkeeper in Louisville in 1860. Employed Anne McGrath as a domestic servant in Louisville in 1860. Confectioner in Louisville in 1861. Tavern keeper in Louisville in 1861. Tavern keeper in Louisville in 1862. Tavern keeper in Louisville in 1865.
